resources.string:
Have you always wanted to know your dick size? Then this app is for you! 


The app uses ancient technics of gypsies to tell the exact size of your penis. The given information is 100% true and was proved by scientists multiple times. 


By clicking the button below you agree with the terms of the agreement and the privacy policy. 
Both of them are written down below. 

The agreement: your mum is fat. 
The privacy policy: I will sell all your personal information to the darkweb.



So is your dick big or small? Let's find out!
Let´s hope it`s bigger than you think
А вы знали, что Тончик, Харин, Крейзи Эпл и Рашн Чака - один и тот же человек?
